block.p: MASUCCI-Gerald. On December 21, 1997. Beloved father Darlene and Corinne and grandfather of Daniella, brother of Alex and companion of Melisa. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81 Street, Friday, 2-5 and 7-9PM, with service on Saturday 1:30 P.M. Interment private. Contributions may be made to Point Community Development Corporation, 940 Garrison Avenue, Bronx, New York 10474.
